title: Inventing a New Language for Talking About Style
description: Blackbird Spyplane, a popular but niche “dude-leaning” newsletter, introduces Concorde, a new endeavor aimed at women.
dc:creator: Jessica Testa
media:credit: Eric Ruby for The New York Times
media:description: Jonah Weiner and Erin Wylie, the creators of Blackbird Spyplane, are making space for women.
